layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x46
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x46
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x30
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 784x30 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 782x28
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 782x24
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 388x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (185,2) size 201x19
                text run at (185,2) width 201: "Cell text should be right aligned"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (392,2) size 388x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (185,2) size 201x19
                text run at (185,2) width 201: "Cell text should be right aligned"
